catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 18
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: framed: encircled Buddha seated with double flaming halo at C, surrounded by eight similar encircled figures, each with a unique appearance; two floating clouds above with three attendants playing instruments, floating crown at top C; semicircle at LL with four-armed figure holding scepter, surrounded in flames; triangle at LR with seated figure holding small sword, surrounded by flames; arabesque design with a pot lower C
title: Sonsho Mandala
